title: IPH 95 - Now thank we all our God

lines: Now thank we all our God
with hearts and hands and voices;
has blessed us on our way
through all our life be near us:
to fill our hearts with joy
and with His peace to cheer us;
to keep us in His grace
to free us from all ills
in this world and the next.
All praise and thanks to God
for so it was, is now

CCLI:
Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649
translated Catherine Winkworth, 1827-1878 adapted Compilers of Praise! 2000 CCLI 128675
